item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 6, 2024 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Starship's Sixth Flight Test (133 points | 113 comments)
2. Private Cloud Compute Security Guide (210 points | 83 comments)
3. Show HN: Hacker News frontpage as a print newspaper that you can personalize (137 points | 50 comments)
4. Launch HN: Midship (YC S24) – Turn PDFs and Images into usable data (25 points | 18 comments)
5. Show HN: SuperSplat – open-source 3D Gaussian Splat Editor (149 points | 38 comments)
6. New images of Jupiter (352 points | 54 comments)
7. Useful built-in macOS command-line utilities (585 points | 149 comments)
8. WebSockets cost us $1M on our AWS bill (99 points | 37 comments)
9. Solving the Siberian Crater Mystery (8 points | 2 comments)
10. Title drops in movies (428 points | 142 comments)
11. Model Predictive Control in the Browser with WebAssembly (60 points | 8 comments)
12. Japan's declining births on track to fall below 700k (17 points | 14 comments)
13. Learning not to trust the All-In podcast (186 points | 55 comments)
14. Monorepo – Our Experience (67 points | 70 comments)
15. Show HN: Term-Lisp – A Lisp, based on pattern matching and term rewriting (30 points | 9 comments)
16. Kernel optimization with BOLT (binary optimization and layout tool) (109 points | 10 comments)
17. Trump wins presidency for second time (1383 points | 6217 comments)
18. Switch 2 will be backwards compatible with Switch (183 points | 123 comments)
19. 98.css – A design system for building faithful recreations of old UIs (309 points | 73 comments)
20. The truth about latchkey kids (12 points | 8 comments)
21. Politicians are Jungian symbols, policies are facades (7 points | 1 comment)
22. Only 5.3% of US welders are women. After years as a professor, I became one (207 points | 291 comments)
23. Hacking cars in JavaScript (Replay attacks in the browser with the HackRF) (21 points | 1 comment)
24. Forget CDK and AWS's insane costs. Pulumi and DigitalOcean to the rescue (5 points | 1 comment)
25. AMD Ryzen 7 9800X3D Linux Performance: Zen 5 With 3D V-Cache (111 points | 71 comments)
26. 3D Rotation Design (71 points | 14 comments)
27. Upcoming changes to the DNSSEC root trust anchor (78 points | 23 comments)
28. What has case distinction but is neither uppercase nor lowercase? (143 points | 69 comments)
29. Breaking the image: a 12th-century Ai Weiwei? (23 points | 17 comments)
30. Powering the Mars Base (80 points | 65 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 6, 2024 at 8:15 PM UTC
